verb.definition: To transport or convey something (informal/constructed usage)
verb.example: The company vehicled the goods across the city using their fleet.

noun.definition: A means of transporting people or goods, especially on land
noun.example: The truck is a large vehicle used for deliveries.

usage_examples: The vehicle pulled up in front of the house to pick them up.
They vehicled the equipment to the site before dawn.
